Thanks [~lewuathe] for the patch! The exception/error has already been printed out in the log statement above the if statement. Do you think the log inside the if statement is redundant?
[~haibo.chen] Thanks. Right as you said, it's redundant. We can remove {{LOG.error}} instead of rewrite, I think.
